Class ExtendedDamageSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.util.DamageSource
      • org.cyclops.evilcraft.ExtendedDamageSource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedDamageSource.VengeanceBeamDamageSource

    public class ExtendedDamageSource
extends net.minecraft.util.DamageSource
    An extension of the Minecraft DamageSource.
